name: test_rotate_secret_key
description:
arrange: build and deploy the flask charm.
    act: run rotate-secret-key action on the leader unit.
    assert: Flask applications on every unit should have a new secret key configured.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: build and deploy the flask charm.
act: run rotate-secret-key action on the leader unit.
assert: Flask applications on every unit should have a new secret key configured.
